import React, { useState } from "react"; import CardTable from "components/Cards/CardTable.js"; export default function Schedules() { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [editingSchedule, setEditingSchedule] = useState(null); const [scheduleData, setScheduleData] = useState({ expressId: "", busId: "", departureDate: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "scheduled" }); const [schedulesList, setSchedulesList] = useState([ { id: 1, expressId: "Express 1", busId: "BUS001", departureDate: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "08:00", arrivalTime: "10:30", availableSeats: "45", price: "2500", status: "scheduled" }, { id: 2, expressId: "Express 2", busId: "BUS002", departureDate: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "09:00", arrivalTime: "11:00", availableSeats: "30", price: "2000", status: "scheduled" } ]); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScheduleData({ ...scheduleData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (editingSchedule) { // Update existing schedule setSchedulesList(schedulesList.map(item => item.id === editingSchedule.id ? { ...scheduleData, id: editingSchedule.id } : item )); setEditingSchedule(null); } else { // Add new schedule const newSchedule = { ...scheduleData, id: Date.now() }; setSchedulesList([...schedulesList, newSchedule]); } // Reset form setScheduleData({ expressId: "", busId: "", departureDate: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "scheduled" }); setShowForm(false); }; const handleEdit = (schedule) => { setEditingSchedule(schedule); setScheduleData(schedule); setShowForm(true); }; const handleDelete = (id) => { setSchedulesList(schedulesList.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const handleCancel = () => { setShowForm(false); setEditingSchedule(null); setScheduleData({ expressId: "", busId: "", departureDate: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "scheduled" }); }; return ( <>

Schedule Management

{showForm && (

{editingSchedule ? "Edit Schedule" : "Add New Schedule"}

)}
{schedulesList.map((schedule) => ( ))}
Express Bus Date Departure Arrival Seats Price Status Actions
{schedule.expressId}
{schedule.busId} {schedule.departureDate} {schedule.departureTime} {schedule.arrivalTime} {schedule.availableSeats} {schedule.price} RWF {schedule.status}
); }
